Content.Text:
<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can grow all sorts of stuff here on
the farm; not only <GREEN>vegetables</GREEN>, but also
<GREEN>fruit</GREEN>, <GREEN>flowers</GREEN> and <GREEN>herbs</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
There are many varieties, so try
growing as many as you can!
<PAGE>
That covers produce. You can make your
own plans for the land and just enjoy
growing whatever you like!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that? You want to know what
exactly you should be doing?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah. There's no need to think
too hard about it. Just do whatever you
like, whenever you like.
<PAGE>
This is your life. Find something you
want to do with it and do it!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you really want some advice from me,
I'd suggest starting by growing produce
in your fields for a while.
<PAGE>
You're here to run the farm, so grow
things, ship them out and make some
money.
<PAGE>
Once you've made enough money you will
also be able to keep <RED>animals</RED> on your
farm. Then you'll really be farming.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can also ship out items or bugs that
you collect in order to make some money.
Use this to make some additional cash.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I also suggest interacting a little with
<RED>wild animals</RED>.
<PAGE>
Animals like <GREEN>produce</GREEN>, after all. Try
giving them some as <RED>feed</RED>.
<PAGE>
That's all the advice I've got for you.
I hope it helped!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Glad to hear it. I'd better be getting
on, anyway. Good luck, <MYNAME>.

Today is day one of your official new
life as a farm owner! Here we go! So,
where to get started...

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can grow all sorts of stuff here on
the farm; not only vegetables, but also
fruit, flowers and herbs.
<PAGE>
There are many varieties, so challenge
a wide range!
<PAGE>
That covers produce. You can set up your
own plans for the land and just enjoy
growing whatever you like!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's that? You want to know what
exactly you should be doing?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah hah. There's no need to think
too hard about it. Just do whatever you
like, whenever you like.
<PAGE>
This is your life. Find something you
want to do with it and do it!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you really want some advice from me,
I'd suggest starting by growing produce
in your fields for a while.
<PAGE>
You're here to run the farm, so grow

money.
<PAGE>
Once you've made enough money you will
also be able to keep <RED>animals</RED> on your
farm. Then you'll really be farming.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can also ship out items or bugs that

Use this to make some additional cash.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I also suggest interacting a little with

<PAGE>
Animals like <GREEN>produce</GREEN>, after all. Try

<PAGE>
That's all the advice I've got for you.
I hope it helped!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Glad to hear it. I'd better be getting
on, anyway. Good luck, <MYNAME>.
